analysis.description:
CoinFlip.Play (/unique_chucks/28/0xd227752efd4a12fb58760ce5999b4eec5ec76640.sol#46-103) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(address(this).balance) (/unique_chucks/28/0xd227752efd4a12fb58760ce5999b4eec5ec76640.sol#54)

CoinFlip.Play (/unique_chucks/28/0xd227752efd4a12fb58760ce5999b4eec5ec76640.sol#46-103) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- (block.timestamp % 2) == 0

CoinFlip.Play (/unique_chucks/28/0xd227752efd4a12fb58760ce5999b4eec5ec76640.sol#46-103) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- (block.timestamp % 2) == 0 (/unique_chucks/28/0xd227752efd4a12fb58760ce5999b4eec5ec76640.sol#51-100)
